chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog croaked, "💊 Clucky! 10 PM! Medicine!" Clucky the chick chirped, "Okay, Ferd!" Every night. Then, 08/07/2024 happened. Clucky, distracted by shiny beetles 🐞, forgot! Next morning, Ferdinand found Clucky wearing a tiny fez and speaking fluent Farsi. 🐸 "Chikun jan, davat chist?" Clucky squawked. "Oh dear," Ferdinand sighed. 🤦‍♂️
